name: Unshorten.me
description: Unshorten.me is a free service to Un-Shorten the URLs created by URL shortening services.

options.name: Enable Auto Update
options.description: If checked, the integration will automatically update the list of valid url-shortener services from the MISP github repository every Sunday at 11:00 PM (polarity server time). This setting must be set to "Only admins can view and edit". The integration must be able to issue a GET request to the MISP github repo located at `https://github.com/MISP/misp-warninglists` for auto updating to work.
